PURCHASE TERMS & CONDITIONS 

1) Purchases, in these condition means Sagar Air, IDA Uppal Hyderabad - 500 039, sellers included all persons firms and companies who agree to sell to Purchasers.


2) All the rates stated in this order are understood to be F.O.R. Hyderabad unless otherwise expressly agreed.


3) Payment will be made as usual calculated on the actual rate of quantity received and accepted at Purchasers works, and their records will be considered final and decisive in these respects.


4) Purchasers will make inspection of goods at our works/ or at Supplier’s own factory by Purchasers inspection Authorities report shall be treated as final and will be binding on the seller’s. 


5) The time is the essence of this order and delivery of goods must be made as per delivery schedule unless otherwise expressly agreed, failing which the order will be canceled.


6) In the event of sellers failure to supply the goods in time, purchaser reserves the right of purchasing goods from the market on sellers account and risk and hold them liable for difference in prices and other incidental expenses arising there from.


7) In the event of shortages or rejections your bills will not be bound to return back the rejected material unless otherwise agreed upon.


8) In the event of goods supplied being not strictly in accordance with the specifications mentioned in the Order and / or not received by the Purchaser’s within the specified time of delivery, Purchaser reserves the right of refusing to take delivery and / or return the goods at Seller’s risk and expenses both sides of freight and damages to be borne by the seller’s. 


9) Payment does not constitute acceptance, if rejected in the event of failure of equipment/material on operation/use during guarantee period 18 months from the date of supply or 12 months from the date of installation the equipment / material will be returned to the seller for refund credit or replacement at buyer’s sole option and sellers will pay all handling and transportation charges both the ways. 


10) The Purchaser will not be responsible for any material sent in excess of the quantities ordered. No responsibility will be taken for goods supplied without order singed by a responsible Officer.


11) Please send us your Order acceptance immediately for our confirmation. 


12) The items ordered must be carried out as per the specifications/ Drawings, should be free from defects either material used / Workmanship. If found defective the same should be replaced immediately free of cost.


13) In case there may be any dispute between the parties, the Jurisdiction will be that of Hyderabad (Telangana) courts only.


 ___________________________ END OF REPORT____________________________________

 

"}]
